title: AgentBuilder: Exploring Scaffolds for Prototyping User Experiences of Interface Agents
description: We explore the capabilities that prompt-based agent prototyping systems should support and developer needs of agent prototyping through the AgentBuilder design probe.

title: Understanding Prompt Programming Tasks and Questions
description: We develop a taxonomy of the questions asked and tasks done during prompt programming, and study which of these are addressed by existing research and commercial tools.

title: Interpreting Hate Speech Classifiers: Does Dataset Label Space Matter?
description: We use artificial intelligence interpretability methods to understand how hate speech classifiers make decisions and whether the dataset label space influences such decisions.

title: Visual COMET: Visual Commonsense Reasoning in Time
description: I developed a research demo for Visual COMET to make visual commonsense inferences on images for events before, during, and after the image.
